name: Room Racer AR
description:
Room Racer is a frantic augmented reality racing game you can play anywhere. Race against bots in single player mode, or go head-to-head with a friend in multiplayer mode!

With a super-simple tap-to-accelerate system, it's easy for anyone to pick up and play Room Racer - but rather tricky to master...

• Complete all nine tracks against the CPU, or go head-to-head with a friend in multiplayer mode!
• Open up the Track Builder and create your own augmented reality racecourses around your home, office, back garden - wherever you want!
• Collect and use outrageous power-ups like rockets and lasers to blast your opponent off the track and into oblivion.
• Win races and unlock special paint jobs for your car!
• Earn bragging rights by beating your friends on lap leaderboards for every track!
